title: Sichot Avodat Levi
enDesc: Ethical teachings and insights from R' Yaakov Yitzchak Ruderman on the weekly parsha, compiled and published by his student, A.R. Oskowitz.
enShortDesc: 20th-century insights on the weekly Torah portion from the founder of the Ner Yisrael Yeshiva in Baltimore.
heShortDesc: עיונים בפרשת השבוע של מייסד ישיבת נר ישראל בבולטימור, מן המאה ה-20.
